title: How to Make Rivels

steps.headline: Combine flour and salt in a mixing bowl.
Mix in egg, using hands if desired, to make a cornmeal like dough.
Drop bits of dough into boiling soup.
Serve the Rivels with the soup in bowls.

text: Combine flour and salt in a mixing bowl.  Mix in egg, using hands if desired, to make a cornmeal like dough.  Drop bits of dough into boiling soup.  Cook 10 minutes in boiling soup.  Serve the Rivels with the soup in bowls.
